amendment.description: To provide for testimony by Service employees in cases of rape and sexual assault.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4019 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4019 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S1113) To provide for testimony by Service employees in cases of rape and sexual assault.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4019 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4019 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Johnson to Amendment SA 3899.
